AbstractInternalPreloaderMethods
 
Packagecom.crazyfm.core.preloader
Classpublic class AbstractInternalPreloader
InheritanceAbstractInternalPreloader flash.display.MovieClip

Application internal preloader. Application should be built with additional compiler option: "-frame=two,my.cool.package.MyMain", where "my.cool.package.MyMain" is the main application class. After app is completely downloaded, preloader will move to second frame. Before that, use as less classes as possible, so preloader will be shown faster.

init()method 
protected function init():void

Default preloader added to display list and ready to process preloader actions. Override with super, if you want to add additional logic.

reDrawPreloader()method 
protected function reDrawPreloader(bytesLoaded:Number, bytesTotal:Number):void

Redraws native display list preloader. Override, if you wan't to use other way to display preloader.

Parameters

bytesLoaded:Number
 
bytesTotal:Number

removePreloader()method 
protected function removePreloader():void

Removes native display list preloader. Override, if you are using your own way to draw preloader.
